plot: Russian women share with us their hopes and fears as they leave St. Petersburg to find a partner or form a family. They are seeking for somebody to share their dreams with, but reality will be different.
title: Desde Rusia con dolor
plot_es: Russian women share with us their hopes and fears as they leave St. Petersburg to find a partner or form a family. They are seeking for somebody to share their dreams with, but reality will be different.
plot_en: Russian women share with us their hopes and fears as they leave St. Petersburg to find a partner or form a family. They are seeking for somebody to share their dreams with, but reality will be different.
